doc:
Sandy Simpson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandy_Simpson 0 Sandy Simpson is an actor who starred on television, he did not have a long career in acting though he is remembered for his role in the science fiction community in the 1984 hit NBC mini series V: The Final Battle as Mark, a former police officer who is a member of the resistance. Sandy also co-starred in the 1980s short lived TV series Off the Rack as well as making an appearance on The Facts of Life in season 9 episode "Down and Out in Malibu" as Jo's boyfriend, Paul Sandy_Simpson is an_actor who starred on television , he did_not_have a_long_career in acting though he is_remembered for his_role in the_science_fiction_community in the_1984_hit_NBC_mini_series_V : The_Final_Battle as Mark , a_former_police_officer who is a_member of the_resistance . Sandy also co-starred in the_1980s_short_lived_TV_series Off the_Rack as_well as making an_appearance on The_Facts of Life in season_9_episode_"_Down and Out in Malibu " as Jo 's_boyfriend , Paul
